column4: Could someone please help me get my printer working in Karmic??
if it's working, it's all good
It's not printing anything, so no, it's not working
You mistook me for someone with more knowledge than I have!!
The only cups I know are in my kitchen lol
.. if you haven't already done, i suggest you install cups : 'sudo apt-get install cups'
then on a browser, you set it up using http://127.0.0.1:631 (you'll need root password)
the apt-get didn't work, cups may already be installed, just dunno how to use 'em.
if cup is install it should ask for a password when you try to open this web page 127.0.0.1:631
No it didn't, but there was some sort of problem when I ran the sudo apt-get install cups command
sort of.. :) .. you may ask .. well litteraly command should be : 'sudo apt-get install cups'.
if something goes wrong either you tell us the exact reply.. / output or you ask ubuntu affiliates.. i don't use ubuntu
You don't want me to paste the error here, wot's the link for that please?
Then I can give you the output I got running sudo-apt get install cups
error message, only if it is not that big.. otherwise.. cutandpaste.org might be the right place
I will try a few things 'n return later when it's quieter, thanks for your help. Will also try 'n get in touch with a friend using Ubuntu!
